00031 class YardCustType: public XMLNode
00032 {
00033  public:
00034    
00035     friend class YardDatabase;
00036       
00037     YardCustType() { setName("Customer_Table"); }
00038     YardCustType(const string& xml): XMLNode(xml, Str) {}
00039         
00040     static const char * GetUnique() { return "CUST_Account_Number"; }
00041     
00042     /* Getters */
00043     
00045     long GetAccountNumber() const 
00046         { return ToLong(child("CUST_Account_Number").data()); }
00048     string GetFirstName() const 
00049         { return child("CUST_First_Name").data(); }
00051     string GetMiddleName() const
00052         { return child("CUST_Middle_Name").data(); }
00053     string GetFirstLast() const
00054         { return GetFirstName() + string(" ") + GetLastName(); }
00056     string GetLastName() const 
00057         { return child("CUST_Last_Name").data(); }
00060     /*vector<string>*/ 
00061     string GetAddress() const
00062         { return child("CUST_Address").data(); }

00065         { return child("CUST_Phone").data(); }

00068         { return child("CUST_City").data(); }

00070         { return child("CUST_State").data(); }
00072     string GetZip() const
00073         { return child("CUST_Zip").data(); }
00075     string GetCreditCardNumber() const
00076         { return child("CUST_Credit_Card_Number").data(); }
00078     string GetCreditCardExpiration() const
00079         { return child("CUST_CC_Exp_Date").data(); }
00081     string GetCreditCardName() const
00082         { return child("CUST_Name_On_CC").data(); }
00084     string GetSigLocal() const
00085         { return child("CUST_Signature").data(); }
00087     string GetPicLocal() const
00088         { return child("CUST_Photo").data(); }
00089     string GetSince() const
00090         { return child("CUST_Since_Date").data(); }
00091         
00092     string GetHashS() const
00093         { return child("CUST_HASH").data(); }
00094     long GetHash() const
00095         { return ToLong(GetHashS()); }
00096

00098   
00101     void SetAccountNumber(const long a_num) 
00102         { child("CUST_Account_Number").setData(ToStr(a_num)); }
00104     void SetFirstName(const string& str) 
00105         { child("CUST_First_Name").setData(str); }

00108         { child("CUST_Middle_Name").setData(str); }

00117         { child("CUST_Phone").setData(str); }

00137     void SetPicture(const string& str)

00140     void SetSince(YardDate& date)
00141         {   child("CUST_Since_Date").setData(date.ToString());  }
